    • Constructor Detail

      • RemoteAdmBESA

        public RemoteAdmBESA(java.lang.String admAlias,
             double passwd,
             java.lang.String ipRmiRegistry,
             int portRmiRegistry,
             java.lang.String multicastAddr,
             int multicastPort,
             boolean centralized)
              throws BESA.ExceptionBESA
        Creates a unique instance for un distributed administrator.
        Parameters:
        admAlias - Alias/name of the admnistrador.
        passwd - Security key, it is necessary to be able to create or destroy the administrator.
        ipRmiRegistry - The IP address of the machine that contains the administrator to be registered.
        portRmiRegistry - The port of the machine that contains the administrator to be registered.
        multicastAddr - Multicast address used by the administrators in the same SMA.
        multicastPort - Multicast port used by the administrators in the same SMA.
        centralized - Indicates if the container is going to be executed in a single machine or if it is going to be used in a distributed way.
        Throws:
        BESA.ExceptionBESA

      • RemoteAdmBESA

        public RemoteAdmBESA(BESA.Config.ConfigBESA configBESA)
              throws DistributedExceptionBESA
        Creates a unique instance for the local administrator in a JVM.
        Parameters:
        admAlias - Alias/name of the admnistrador.
        passwd - Security key, it is necessary to be able to create or destroy the administrator.
        ipAddress - The IP address of the machine that contains the administrator to be registered.
        rmiPort - The port of the machine that contains the administrator to be registered.
        multicastAddr - Multicast address used by the administrators in the same SMA.
        multicastPort - Multicast port used by the administrators in the same SMA.
        centralized - Indicates if the container is going to be executed in a single machine or if it is going to be used in a distributed way.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If happens an error in the administrator initialization.
        DistributedExceptionBESA

    • Method Detail

      • registerRemoteAdm

        public RemoteAdmHandlerBESA registerRemoteAdm(java.lang.String admId,
                                     java.lang.String admAlias,
                                     java.lang.String ipRmiRegistry,
                                     int portRmiRegistry)
                                       throws BESA.Kernel.System.SystemExceptionBESA
        This registers a remote administrator in another JVM - if not registered is created handler and the lookup.
        Parameters:
        admAlias - Alias/name of the admnistrador.
        passwd - Security key, it is necessary to be able to create or destroy the administrator.
        ipRmiRegistry - The IP address of the machine that contains the administrator to be registered.
        portRmiRegistry - The port of the machine that contains the administrator to be registered.
        Returns:
        Adm remote handler BESA.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception in lookup.
        BESA.Kernel.System.SystemExceptionBESA

      • getAdmByAlias

        public BESA.Kernel.System.Directory.AdmHandlerBESA getAdmByAlias(java.lang.String admAlias)
        Registering a remote administrator present in another JVM - if not registered, is created handler and lookup.
        Parameters:
        admAlias - Alias/name of the admnistrador.
        Returns:
        null if this is a problem -> exception in lookup || there is already a local administrator with the same alias and a different name RMI (possible ambiguity by the same names).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception in lookup.

      • getAdmById

        public BESA.Kernel.System.Directory.AdmHandlerBESA getAdmById(java.lang.String admId)
        Registering a remote administrator present in another JVM - if not registered, is created handler and lookup.
        Parameters:
        admId - Administrator ID.
        Returns:
        null if this is a problem -> exception in lookup || there is already a local administrator with the same alias and a different name RMI (possible ambiguity by the same names).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception in lookup.
